name: Kinke Run ;D
description:
A running game I first made in Unity- as well my first game that I published 

You are your own character running from buildings to buildings, and that's simply it so far!

Don't be a Kinke... (WARNING)

A,D - Lower/Increase Speed

Space - Jump

S - Slide/Bonk Enemies

Haven't implemented the Shop and Customization so you can't open it yet, and there are some bugs as well! 

Credits to: 

Music: 8 Bit Win By HeatleyBros 

Music: Luminare By HeatleyBros
